website_summaries.verdict: The best speed chute to use for training for intense activities and sports.
pros: The broad surface area of the chute captures just enough air to provide great resistance training without too much wind resistance
Strap is durable for heavy use
cons: Size of chute is too small to provide noticeable drag for larger and/or stronger adults

customer_reviews.title: SKLZ parachutes not durable.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased SKLZ parachutes in May 2019 for agility/conditioning camps. Very disappointed in durability of product. Net underneath is coming away from the seams and parachute has holes in chute so I can no longer use. I don't know what has happened to the quality of these parachutes but they do not last. They work great prior defaults. If anyone have some other options of parachutes to purchase that will last the test of time please let me know. I don't want to have to purchase chutes every season. SKLZ may need to look at developing a better parachute
customer_reviews.author: Latricia L.

customer_reviews.title: Minimal resistance offered.
customer_reviews.text: After using this item a few times I honestly think it’s made for younger individuals or lighter weight people. I’m in my mid 30s, weigh 185, and I feel almost zero resistance using this product. It says 15-30 pounds of resistance but I find that you don’t feel much of anything, especially in terms of speed inducing resistance. The quality of the product seems fine, in terms of durability. It doesn’t seem too cheaply pieced together. The overall rating should be lower than the reviews suggest however.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not much resistance
customer_reviews.text: Works but probably best for a little child as it does not provide enough resistance for a conditioned sprinter. I suppose you could double up the chute but as is it barely provides resistance.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Good for military PT
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my unit and worked great during workout sessions. Wish I could have afforded more of them but that one still gave the men a good sprint workout
customer_reviews.author: Trash Panda

customer_reviews.title: Love the burn
customer_reviews.text: Never realized how hard this actually is. Adding that extra edge to my workout. Love this
customer_reviews.author: Edward

customer_reviews.title: Great for HIIT.
customer_reviews.text: I have wanted one of these for a while and finally decided to pull the trigger. I have used it multiple times so far and the durability is great. Very exhausting when used with sprinting. I was surely sore in my legs and abs alike the following day from the intense workout. Stores easily in the pouch that comes with it and easy to set it up. Great product and great price.
customer_reviews.author: 00maxima

customer_reviews.title: Great item long lasting works great and the bag was ...

customer_reviews.title: not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Broke the first time my son used it. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really did nothing for my son when he ran with it. Let down.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Hess

customer_reviews.title: Works very well to increase my acceleration. Definitely play ...
customer_reviews.text: Works very well to increase my acceleration. Definitely play around with it to kind of loosen up the fabric but once it gets going its a breeze. As long as you take care of this (i.e. do not use on a rainy day), this should work very well.
customer_reviews.author: Isaiah J.

customer_reviews.title: Great trainer
customer_reviews.text: This chute is light weight, easy to use, and clean up is a breeze...well lack thereof. The chute opens smoothly. Doesn't jerk. Doesn't pull hard. It moves a bit while running, and based on the breeze it can move a lot in the course of your sprint. This is a really good way to work on form as it slows the motion and helps you get into a natural lean. The belt is snug and comfortable and the set up allows you to wear it in the way that is most comfortable for your body.
customer_reviews.author: Nate Larson

customer_reviews.title: The chute provides some resistance -- just some, even ...
customer_reviews.text: The chute provides some resistance -- just some, even when I stride at full speed (I'm a 17 min 5K runner). So I hope there could be more resistance that makes the workout more meaningful. Another thing is that the chute's own weight causes it to often touch the ground making some noise. But overall this item meets my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Bochun Qiu

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: Kids have used several times- ages 14. 5’9”. Gets the legs burning
customer_reviews.author: Robin Nantz

customer_reviews.title: Nice product but tears easily
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these for coaching youth soccer as it is a fun activity to have the kids race each other and breaks up a standard practice nicely. However, I've already had two different ones rip, which leads me to believe that it won't last long. Both of the chutes I purchased are tearing at the point where the rope meets the parachute itself.
customer_reviews.author: BJ

customer_reviews.title: I love it...!!!
customer_reviews.text: Okay, so I was a little aprehensive at first. I thought that maybe it wouldn't do so well. It never tangles. It always opens up the way it is suppose to. Your coach can tell if you are running fast, the parachute just goes crazey while being pulled behind you. It gives good mild resistance, I think better than a weighted vest, because the vest really only makes you top heavy. Best of all it is fun, you want to do it again and again.
customer_reviews.author: The Terminator

customer_reviews.title: At Home Training for Kids in Sports
customer_reviews.text: Another great SKLZ Training product added to our liking!! Kids can use at home for extra training for sports seasons. Mahalo SKLZ!!

customer_reviews.title: Good construction, resistance, but not quite what I want.
customer_reviews.text: Like the resistance and my players love the change in training regimen, but don't see these as really encouraging good running form. Will play with them more but it seems like there could be a better mechanism than a waist band to encourage the lean I want for sports running, getting the players to push from the balls of their feet.

customer_reviews.title: DRAGSTER!!

I looked at others SKLZ is 1 of the best sport training lines out there. It also came with dvd and workout program. BUY WITH NO HESITATION!!

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful

customer_reviews.title: Christmas present for my son
customer_reviews.text: It was on my son's list and he seems pleased with it. The package was opened immediately, the parachute was strapped to his waist and he was off. 10 minutes later he came back in the house covered with sweat, out of breath and beaming with excitement. First impressions: it looks relatively sturdy and my kid was happy on Christmas morning (which gets sigmificantly harder, and more ecpensive, as they get older). Today is only 12/26/12 so let's just hope it withstands his training program for at least a few months. Based on other reviews, if it lasts until june I will be happy with my purchase.

customer_reviews.title: Great resistance

It was delivered fast and I've had no problems with it. It was easy to set up and use and definitely gave them the resistance they needed. It is a pretty fun product to watch them use, it caused a lot of attention and questions and it has lasting durability. Anyone looking to challenge their endurance and stamina I recommend this chute 100%. The price was very reasonable and like I said the quality was great. Great buy, well worth it!

customer_reviews.title: Good for beginners..
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 15 year old son, who is physically fit, used for him to stay in shape in between practices, games etc. I'm not sure if his fitness level is the reason he feels like it doesn't help him or maybe the chute is too small. The pictures show what looks like adults as well as a teen using it. My son is only 5'6/5'7 and 120 pounds of muscle works out 3-4 out of 7 days plus game days on weekends (he plays soccer and runs track) So depending on your fitness level this chute might not work for you.
customer_reviews.author: Busy mom

product_meta.title: SKLZ Speed Chute Resistance Parachute for Speed and Acceleration Training
product_meta.description: Chase your goals with the original SKLZ Speed Chute, a speed resistance training parachute for all kinds of athletes. Train to improve your speed, stamina, strength, and acceleration. This chute provides 15-30 lbs. of resistance, allowing you to improve your stride length and frequency. The easy release belt buckle gives you the lightweight, explosive feeling as you release the chute mid stride. The SKLZ Speed Chute comes with a 2” thick, durable nylon easy release belt that is adjustable for almost any athlete. With a 360-degree rotation ring, it provides you the freedom to practice a variety of drills, so you can train in any direction. Let the pull of the chute encourage an upright posture, while the free-motion ring allows for a free-sliding, comfortable training aid. When positioned on the right or left hip, it allows you to get off the line laterally. When positioned at the center of your back, it allows for a linear or parallel start. Whether you’re training for sprints, or you’re trying to stay fit during the off season, this resistance training parachute will help keep your goals in gear. You can feel confident that you’re running in the right direction with the SKLZ Speed Chute.
feature_bullets: Maximize acceleration and top running speed through resistance and overspeed training
360° rotation belt with free motion ring allows for movement in any direction
Quick-release belt buckle allows training with acceleration bursts
Built-in mesh panels keep strings from tangling and helps stabilize the chute during training

FIND EXPLOSIVE SPEED. The SKLZ Speed Chute is made for all athletes with serious drive. Train with this chute to increase your strength and speed. Feel the burn as your challenge yourself. Whether you’re in track and field, football, soccer, basketball, or any other sport, your speed will improve with the use of this resistance training chute.

BUILD ENDURANCE. Get more powerful leg drive and stride frequency with the SKLZ Speed Chute. Maximize acceleration and top running speeds through resistance and over speed training. Use it when sprinting, to help increase muscular endurance, improve your stamina, and accelerate faster. This speed training parachute will give you the authority you’re looking for so you can master your sport.

ADJUSTABLE BELT. The adjustable 2-inch heavy-duty nylon belt is fully adjustable and will comfortably fit almost any athlete. The belt rotates 360 degrees and has a free motion ring, meaning you can sprint in any direction. With the ability to have a linear or parallel start, you can truly adjust your training to your specific needs. The quick-release belt buckle lets you feel acceleration bursts, so you can reach top speed.

EASY TO USE AND STORE. Spend more time training, and less time setting up. With a 54”diameter, this chute stores easily in an included training bag. It offers approximately 15-30 lbs. of resistance, which allows you to improve stride length and frequency. The built-in mesh panel helps to stabilize the SKLZ Speed Chute during training, which prevents the cords from tangling, translating to less hassle and more hustle.

INVEST IN YOUR GOALS. Taking care of your body is a crucial part to reaching your physical potential and athletic goals. Train yourself to be your best. SKLZ prides itself on providing the proper tools to help athletes reach their peak performance level. You can feel confident that you’re running in the right direction with the SKLZ Speed Chute.
